about_the_game:
eden is a 3D Screensaver (not a game) with great graphics. Discover beautiful environments: From snow-covered Mountains to a day at a sunny Beach.

Please note: eden is under active development, frequently receiving updates to content and functionality to customers free of charge! In other words: It is currently nowhere near finished, things are likely to change and everything might be a bit rough around the edges. If 'Early Access' isn't your thing at all, please consider not buying this software.

Features so far

  • Lovely handmade/detailed 3D environments
  • Music and sounds matches every level (i.e stormy wind on the mountains, light breeze on the meadow)
  • Easy to use, even for kids (it's also safe for kids)

Planned future Features

  • Workshop Integration - make your own environments and share them with the entire community
Subject to change

Note: This software is in an early state, but already use-able.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12
  • Processor: Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024MB VRAM /w Shader Model 2 & minimum 1024x768 screen size
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
  • Additional Notes: Linux/SteamOS builds are currently experimental. Requirements may change in the future.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Leopard
  • Processor: Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024MB VRAM /w Shader Model 2 & minimum 1024x768 screen size
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
  • Additional Notes: MacOS X builds are currently experimental. Requirements may change in the future.

name: eden - 3D Screensaver

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® XP / Vista / Windows 7 (32-bit/64-bit) / Windows 8/8.1 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024MB VRAM /w Shader Model 2 & minimum 1024x768 screen size
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are experimental. They may change in the future.

short_description: eden is a 3D Screensaver with great graphics. Discover beautiful environments: From snow-covered Mountains to a day at a sunny Beach.
